description: This file provides a singleton pattern implementation for initializing and retrieving a Supabase client in a JavaScript project, supporting environment variable configuration for different build tools (Create React App and Vite). It includes functions to read environment variables safely and warns if required credentials are missing.

methods.name: readEnv()
methods.description: Reads environment variables for Supabase URL and key, supporting both CRA and Vite environments.

methods.name: getSupabaseClient()
methods.description: Returns a singleton Supabase client, creating it if it does not already exist, with environment variable fallback and warning for missing credentials.
